Text: Garden State Paper and Compagnie Papiers Stadacona Board Reports Cc The organizational documents of Garden State Paper and Compagnie Papiers Stadacona require quarterly reports of financial performance and legal issues to be provided to the Boards of Directors The Q reports are attached Let me know if you have any questions Brad A Kirchhofer

FW Garden State Paper Gas Swap Cc Where do we stand on this Can we proceed with providing GSP a valuation of ENAs claim Brad A Kirchhofer Original Message From Lindeman Cheryl Sent Tuesday March AM To Kirchhofer Brad Subject RE Garden State Paper Gas Swap GSP terminated so ENA did not sign I am sending the termination letter to Sara Shackleton Cheryl Lindeman Enron Wholesale Services Enron Industrial Markets LLC Smith Street EB Houston TX Phone Fax Original Message From Kirchhofer Brad Sent Friday March AM To Lindeman Cheryl Subject Garden State Paper Gas Swap Cheryl I thought we terminated the gas swap in the mad scramble before the GSP bankruptcy filing Do you have the documentation of who sighed for ENA Brad A Kirchhofer Original Message From Ruiz Carlos Sent Friday March AM To Kirchhofer Brad Subject FW Garden State Paper FYI Original Message From Dicarlo Louis Sent Friday March AM To Ruiz Carlos Subject FW Garden State Paper Sara and Cheryl need to discuss this data request Please have Cheryl contact Sara so she can understand the exact nature of the request and any deadline issues Thanks Original Message From Shackleton Sara Sent Friday March AM To Dicarlo Louis Cc Lindeman Cheryl Bruce Robert Subject RE Garden State Paper This appears to be an open position since neither party has terminated on the Master Log Any reason why one party cannot terminate Is this a single swap or several I think PWC ought to reveiw our valuation and Bobs curve since it becomes a matter of public record when the claim is filed in the bankruptcy Any valuation ought to be documented Original Message From Dicarlo Louis Sent Friday March AM To Shackleton Sara Cc Ruiz Carlos Subject Garden State Paper Carlos Ruiz is asking for the value of the ENAGarden State Paper GSP swap to be included as a creditor in the GSP bankruptcy GSP is a bankrupt affiliate and the purpose of the valuation is not to settle but merely to show the claim that ENA has against GSP Can I provide him a MTM on the position The internal attorney involved is Cheryl Lindeman Thanks Louis R DiCarlo ENA Gas Structuring Phone Email
